solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_3.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_3.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Token.withdrawToken (patch_3.sol#29-36):
	-require(bool)(_token.call(bytes4(keccak256()(transfer(address,uint256))),_to,_amount)) patch_3.sol#35

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable.changeOwner (patch_3.sol#11) is not in mixedCase
